channel.title: Is this possible?
channel.description: Since i don't know where this should go but...... ive seen rye make a server withstand 2000 people, but... is it possible to host the same server on different servers/vps's loading the same character data, thus making a world system such as runescapes? so like you log in, you choose a world or...server, and login, no data lost.. can this be done?

item.title: Is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @mandood77 mandood77
item.description:
@mandood77 wrote:

if thats the case, i might actually test it out, but the damned place called school is starting soon

Read full topic

item.title: Is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:4, topic:353100”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=449413.msg3297225#msg3297225 date=1281032354]
Actually this is simpler than you are making it sound. Use a MySQL server to store the Character data, and from there, making it so both servers can read/write to the same SQL server.
[/quote]

He will also have to make it check for which world it is logged in to keep it so people can’t log in multiple times in different servers.[/quote]

Soo, create a USERID type setting? Have a MySQL online list and is updated from both servers, using those ID’s for the players.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

CoonHunter:

Actually this is simpler than you are making it sound. Use a MySQL server to store the Character data, and from there, making it so both servers can read/write to the same SQL server.

He will also have to make it check for which world it is logged in to keep it so people can’t log in multiple times in different servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Actually this is simpler than you are making it sound. Use a MySQL server to store the Character data, and from there, making it so both servers can read/write to the same SQL server.

item.title: Is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Any thing is possible if you put your mind to it, and yes you could do something like this. We already know people who have, Jagex.

Read full topic

Since i don’t know where this should go but…
ive seen rye make a server withstand 2000 people, but… is it possible to host the same server on different servers/vps’s loading the same character data, thus making a world system such as runescapes? so like you log in, you choose a world or…server, and login, no data lost… can this be done?
